summary: The night manager of a Cairo hotel is recruited to infiltrate an arms dealer's inner circle.
cast: Hugh Laurie|Tom Hiddleston|Elizabeth Debicki|Olivia Colman|Alistair Petrie|Michael Nardone|Hovik Keuchkerian|Adeel Akhtar|Tom Hollander|Douglas Hodge|David Harewood|Natasha Little|Antonio de la Torre|Tobias Menzies|Noah Jupe|Katherine Kelly|Nasser Memarzia|Simona Brown|Buffy Davis|Jonathan Aris|Neil Morrissey|Marta Torné|David Avery|Tábata Cerezo|Amir El-Masry|Aure Atika|Alice Bier Zanden|Sam Redford|Gabriel Andreu|Nancy Baldwin|Sara Stewart|Esther Regina|Tressa Brooks|Aymen Hamdouchi|Nader Boussandel|Holly Hayes|Aziz Dhiouer|Salvador Oliva|Russell Tovey|Mohamed Boussalem|Gregor Acuña-Pohl|Branwell Donaghey|Mario de la Rosa|Alex Delescu|Sean Adames|Bartholomew Cariss|Mansour Badri|Erich Redman|Andie Betty|Bijan Daneshmand|Jorge Suquet|Gertrude Thoma|Cuco Usín|Malcolm Freeman|Hannah Steele|Casimiro Torrero|Amal Chakir|Conor McCarry|Yahyaoui Mohamed|José Luis Moreno|Beth Walker|Said Bey|Duncan Pow|Umit Ulgen|Eric MacLennan|Kevin O'Loughlin|Mourad Zaoui|Abigail McKern|Abdelmoula Hadif|Fleur Keith|Kader Ben|Harry Attwell|Rami Nasr|Caroline Loncq|Gido Schimanski|Andrei Zayats|Emily Stride|Lauren Beacham|Walles Hamonde|Pascal Holzer|John le Carré|Marian Lorencik|Janette Sharpe|Said Taibi|Adrian Tauss
title: El infiltrado
